name: A Colorful FPS 2 Play
description:
There's no real plot or story, the main objective here is to survive as many waves as possible, it's an arcade, the theme for the jam was 4 Colors, so well, decided to directly apply it to the game by shooting paint at the enemies (which are cubes with no real texture, because I barely had time to code this thing I less than 5 days lol), you shoot paint at them and color them that way, when they fully reach any of the 4 colors, they die. In order to make things correctly one should try to move around while shooting the correct colors in order to shut them down faster.

(And kill as many as possible to get more coins and buy new guns, put to 8 in total)

There are many other gamemode-like I wanted to include but had no time, I even learned what probuilder was the night before finishing the jam ._.

Game features almost NO audio (I recommend you to lower your volume since you may find the 2 only sounds there totally anti-climatic and even annoying too, sorry..), custom models made by me, along with the art, and then obviously some third party assets I used to build everything. So sad I couldn't investigate and add something like painting stuff for real or maybe research more into how shaders work. Oh well xD

Anyway, enjoy!
